intro: Psychotria oreadum, commonly known as the mountain psychotria, is a flowering plant native to the Andean regions of South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. Psychotria oreadum is also known for its ornamental value and is sometimes cultivated in gardens for its attractive foliage and blooms.
